title: Amazon Linux 2023 - ALAS2023-2024-734: Medium priority package update for amazon-ecr-credential-helper
description:
Package updates are available for Amazon Linux 2023 that fix the following vulnerabilities:
CVE-2024-24790:
	The various Is methods (IsPrivate, IsLoopback, etc) did not work as expected for IPv4-mapped IPv6 addresses, returning false for addresses which would return true in their traditional IPv4 forms.
